sql.query: INSERT INTO submission_galley_settings (galley_id, locale, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type) SELECT galley_id, locale, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type FROM article_galley_settings WHERE setting_name <> 'excludeDoi' AND setting_name <> 'excludeURN'
DELETE FROM submission_settings WHERE setting_name IN ('excludeDoi', 'excludeURN')
